channel.title: johnjohnston tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from johnjohnston.

item.title: tdc3841 #ds106 #myFest22 #ds106 After a very long time I found 811 paths with 5 degrees of separation from "Digital storytelling" to "Deergrass" on Six Degrees of Wikipedia! https://t.co/4nCe5D3U2u via @_jwngr

item.description:
@ds106dc #tdc3839 #ds106 #myFest22 This daily create, An invitation is waiting: So maybe later.

I could start making, I will just read the paper: History is breaking.

Watching the tweets flow, My endorphins a go-go: Maybe just doom scroll.

Not quite some haiku, In two hundred & eighty
item.source:markdown:
@ds106dc #tdc3839 #ds106 #myFest22 This daily create, An invitation is waiting: So maybe later.
I could start making, I will just read the paper: History is breaking.
Watching the tweets flow, My endorphins a go-go: Maybe just doom scroll.
Not quite some haiku, In two hundred & eighty

item.description:
Small Tortoiseshell:

Meadow Brown

Had a short walk by Jaw Reservoir, yesterday. Quite a few butterflies about. These posed. A lot of ringlets, a few whites and a red admiral did not oblige. https://t.co/4TlyPHLgrw
item.source:markdown:

Meadow Brown
Had a short walk by Jaw Reservoir, yesterday. Quite a few butterflies about. These posed. A lot of ringlets, a few whites and a red admiral did not oblige. https://t.co/4TlyPHLgrw

item.description:
@TeacherToolkit @IanStuart66 I wonder how #edtech is defined ðŸ¤¯

For me: a text editor For my current teaching situation, 1-2-1 iPads: Notes app & airdrop
Spot the fox Along the Forth & Clyde Canal. https://t.co/xe9adDQ1H9
item.source:markdown: Spot the fox Along the Forth & Clyde Canal. https://t.co/xe9adDQ1H9

item.description: Yesterday I saw this wee one struggling in the grass just as drizzle stopped and the sun came out. I carefully lifted it up held it in the sunlight and it flew off. https://t.co/lhN7HJNKCT
item.source:markdown: Yesterday I saw this wee one struggling in the grass just as drizzle stopped and the sun came out. I carefully lifted it up held it in the sunlight and it flew off. https://t.co/lhN7HJNKCT

item.description: Back to Old Kilpatrick this morning to walk to Duncolm. Notes, photos & map: walkmap https://t.co/3LhP0hQnmZ https://t.co/srh9hebhv1

item.description: Kilpatrick Muir Flora, walk this afternoon, overcast warm with a breeze. Quite a lot of ringlets fluttering. https://t.co/4koXAGtqok
item.source:markdown: Kilpatrick Muir Flora, walk this afternoon, overcast warm with a breeze. Quite a lot of ringlets fluttering. https://t.co/4koXAGtqok

item.description: A tiny thought on the current uk news. It worries me they way politicians use Twitter to post letters of resignation & the like. Trusting Twitter with something so important seems like a mistake. Surly they should post somewhere they control & forward to Twitter #indieweb
item.source:markdown: A tiny thought on the current uk news. It worries me they way politicians use Twitter to post letters of resignation & the like. Trusting Twitter with something so important seems like a mistake. Surly they should post somewhere they control & forward to Twitter #indieweb

item.description: @ronald_2008 Of course, famous one from your country https://t.co/yHo9ntSoqv Beautiful They seem to be doing well here. See more now than when I was young.
Goldfinch in the Grounds of Gartnavel Hospital. Patches of weeds and wildflowers paying off. https://t.co/QWfm7K9syJ
item.source:markdown: Goldfinch in the Grounds of Gartnavel Hospital. Patches of weeds and wildflowers paying off. https://t.co/QWfm7K9syJ

item.description:
@ds106dc @gifadog @mdvfunes I only met Colin on #Ds106radio when he occasionally added some much needed sense to our #ds106 chat. I imagine he is currently shaking angelic cloud cushions with some vigour.

item.description:
Troisgeach & Meall an Fhudair

White clover Plantain Tormentil, everywhere all day Thistles Whinchat nagging bracken

Bog Asphodel Bog & bell Heather Milkwort Bedstraw

Deer grass Ladies mantel Water Avens Saxifrage Thyme Butterwort

Red Deer, frogs & ring ouzel https://t.co/ZDsc3lceFi
item.source:markdown:
Troisgeach & Meall an Fhudair
White clover Plantain Tormentil, everywhere all day Thistles Whinchat nagging bracken
Bog Asphodel Bog & bell Heather Milkwort Bedstraw
Deer grass Ladies mantel Water Avens Saxifrage Thyme Butterwort
Red Deer, frogs & ring ouzel https://t.co/ZDsc3lceFi

item.description: Read: Islands of Abandonment by Cal Flyn 5â˜… ðŸ“š The book travels to places abandoned by people & recovered to varying degrees by nature. It evokes the 'islands' weirdness powerfully. The last chapters go further, reaching into deep time, climate crisis & even faith. Marvellous.
item.source:markdown: Read: Islands of Abandonment by Cal Flyn 5â˜… ðŸ“š The book travels to places abandoned by people & recovered to varying degrees by nature. It evokes the 'islands' weirdness powerfully. The last chapters go further, reaching into deep time, climate crisis & even faith. Marvellous.
